info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 14 at 12:10PM EDT until August 15 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...High waves up to 6 feet and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. * WHERE...In Illinois: Lake, Northern Cook, and Central Cook Counties. In Indiana: Lake County. * WHEN...From 1 PM CDT this afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. For information on swim advisories or bans at Chicago beaches: www. cpdbeaches. com.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
